tourguide.service

Class TourGuideService

  • java.lang.Object
    • tourguide.service.TourGuideService

  • @Service
public class TourGuideService
extends java.lang.Object
    Core Service of the application.
    It is used to track the user's location, to get trip deals, to get nearby locations and to get the last location of a user.

        public gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation getUserLocation(User user)
        Track or get the last visited location of the user set as parameter.
        Parameters:
        user -
        Returns:
        user.getVisitedLocations().isEmpty() => true -> track the user ; false -> get the last visited location.

      • distanceBetweenUserAndAttraction

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Double,java.lang.String> distanceBetweenUserAndAttraction(User user)
        The distance between the user's location and the attraction's location.
        It sort the distance by making use of a TreeMap.
        Parameters:
        user -
        Returns:
        Map, double = distance from the : String = name of the attraction
